items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: A savory pizza with a thin and crispy crust, topped with tomato sauce, cheese, spicy pepperoni slices, and a sprinkle of oregano.

items.name: Four Cheese Pizza
items.description: A rich pizza with a thin and crispy crust, topped with tomato sauce and a blend of four cheeses: mozzarella, gorgonzola, parmesan, and fontina.
